title: Porvesh Balasubramanian's (porveshb) software portfolio | Devpost
meta_description: Porvesh Balasubramanian specializes in C++ and Python. Follow Porvesh Balasubramanian on Devpost!
main_content: Freshify Turn overcrowded fridges into simple, manageable lists with Freshify! Use our app's built-in artificial intelligence to track expiration dates and get tailored recipe recommendations on the fly.

Freshify
                

                  Turn overcrowded fridges into simple, manageable lists with Freshify! Use our app's built-in artificial intelligence to track expiration dates and get tailored recipe recommendations on the fly.
